name: "Empty" V1.0.0 testers version
description:
Introduction and concept:

This is a place to enjoy drawing and arts. Players have to use different types of brushes to go through various obstacles and challenges, and so forth, you might have to use the proper brushes to discover the secrets, to build stairs for going up, to light your way..... This game is created for research purposes, it helps me to have a deeper understanding of player interactivity, player agency, and level design. 

This game is still under development and has not been completed yet. However, if you find this game interesting please follow my Instagram for further updates. 

This version of the game is for playtesters, if you have any valuable feedback after playing through the game please contact me on Instagram and your name might be shown up on the credit list! :)

This game contains an easter egg which I can offer a free cup of coffee if you find it in the game. :)

Otherwise, if you enjoy this game, please donate to support my game and research process.

This game does not contain copyright resources and soundtracks.

The credit is promised to show at the end of the gameplay.

This game has a local host/join mechanism that allows you to invite friends from the same network to join for fun! (This mechanic is still under development and not really statable)

Mechanism:

W,A,S,D - character basic movement.

Space - Jump

LMB - Draw

Scroll Wheel - change brush sizes

E - switch brushes

P - Pause the game (you can adjust the graphic setting by clicking the setting button)

Brushes:

No.01 Marker pen

No.02 Oil Painting brush

No.03 Gummy bear rain!!!

No.04 3D Cube brush

No.05 Light brush

No.06 Destroy brush (which can be used to destroy  any types of unwanted 3D brushes)

Anyway I hope you enjoy the game!
